rules.natural: If the platform publishes content, then the platform is operational.
Under the condition that an event is a regional event in a region, the publication is a sponsored publication for content.
If the content is promotional content for an event, then the platform publishes the content.

If the content receives automated approval, then either the content requires manual approval, or if it is not the case that the platform approving the content does not imply the platform publishes it, and that leads to the content violating the alcohol policy, then the content is pending review.
The content receives automated approval or the content receives supervisor approval.
If the content violates the deadline, then it is not the case that the content meets the approval deadline.
Provided that the content severely violates the deadline, the content violates the deadline.
If the platform incurs a penalty, then it is not the case that the content has a legal compliance issue.
Whenever the platform is under regulatory investigation, the platform incurs a penalty.
If the platform undergoes a compliance audit, and if it is not the case that the platform is under regulatory investigation, then the platform receives a warning.
Provided that the content is under escalated review, the content is pending review.

Either the content is published content, or if it is not the case that the platform approving the content does not imply the platform publishes it, and that leads to the content violating the alcohol policy, then the content is under escalated review.
If the administrator rejects the content, then it is not the case that the content is published content.
Either the administrator rejects the content or the system flags the content.
Whenever the system flags the content, it is not the case that the content is published content.
Provided that the platform schedules an event, the event is a regional event in a region.
If it is not the case that the publication being a sponsored publication for content implies the content is promotional content for an event, then the publication has conflicting sponsorship.

If it is not the case that the publication being a sponsored publication for content implies the content is promotional content for an event, then it is not the case that the publication has conflicting sponsorship.
If it is not the case that either the platform conducts an internal review or the platform undergoes a compliance audit, then the platform is subject to an external investigation.

If it is not the case that either the platform conducts an internal review or the platform undergoes a compliance audit, then it is not the case that the platform is subject to an external investigation.

If it is not the case that the negation of the content receiving supervisor approval implies that either the content requires manual approval or if it is not the case that the platform approving the content does not imply the platform publishes it, and that leads to the content violating the alcohol policy, then the content is pending review, and that implies the content undergoes approval escalation, does not hold, then the content meets the approval deadline.

If it is not the case that the negation of the platform approving the content does not imply the platform publishes it, and that leads to the content violating the alcohol policy, implies the content is pending review, does not hold, then the content has a legal compliance issue.

It is not the case that the platform receives a warning.
It is not the case that the platform conducts an internal review.
It is not the case that the content violates the alcohol policy.
It is not the case that the content is pending review.

(A1 → G).natural: If the platform publishes content, then the platform is operational.

(A22 → ¬A21).natural: If the platform incurs a penalty, then it is not the case that the content has a legal compliance issue.

(A23 → A22).natural: Whenever the platform is under regulatory investigation, the platform incurs a penalty.

(A26 ∨ A25).natural: Either the platform conducts an internal review or the platform undergoes a compliance audit.

(A5 → A4).natural: Provided that the content is under escalated review, the content is pending review.

(A6 ∨ (¬(¬(A2 → A1) → A3) → A5)).natural: Either the content is published content, or if it is not the case that the platform approving the content does not imply the platform publishes it, and that leads to the content violating the alcohol policy, then the content is under escalated review.
